isFlush() - Method in class poker.object.Hand
Check the hand is flush or not
A flush is a hand where all of the cards are the same suit, if each card you have is all one suit, such as 3 of Clubs, 5 of Clubs, 6 of Clubs, 8 of Clubs and King of Clubs, then you have a Flush.

isStraight() - Method in class poker.object.Hand
